message: Salt too much! The broth is as salty as the sea.
A dash too much salt, be careful with the green papaya next time.
It has a very strong taste because of all that pepper.
You have an abundance of pepper here, cook.
Whoever eats this will get their throat scratched with all that pepper.
I wonder if pepper regrets being used by you.
This would be better paired with indian mango with all that soy sauce.
Maybe just replace the papaya with mango? Since there's already too much soy sauce.
Whoever eats this will be coughing. Maybe cut the soy sauce?
Are you sure your tongue will not dry out with all the salt?
A very slippery dish you have here. Maybe lessen the oil next time?
I might feel sick with all the oil.
Why is this dish swimming in oil?
I wish everyone has money to use so much oil as you have.
Salt is just right! The broth tastes clean and comforting.
Cooking time nailed! The chicken is tender and the vegetables are perfect.
Excellent balance! This tinola feels warm and soothing.
Tinola is piping hot and tasty! Next time, follow steps for legendary soup mastery.
Chicken and vegetables cooked perfectly! Steps were playful, but taste is king.
The flavors are soothing and richâ€”just a tiny detour in steps.
